text: Taynen anɨb agak? Ned Helod nɨmam Pilip bin ne Helodiyas nop si dak. Dek, Jon ne Helod nop agak, Nad namam olap bin ak dɨpan, ak teplep ma mɨdeb agak. Agek, bin Helodiyas Jon nop mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd agek, Helod bɨne ogɨnap agyokek, am Jon nop dad apɨl, nag lɨlak. Bin Helodiyas, Jon nop paklin agɨl gos nɨgak ak pen, ñagɨlɨnɨmuŋ tek ma yek.
